English: replaying the same old tunes (idiom); conservative, unoriginal and discredited
francais: (expr. idiom.) jouer toujours la même rengaine

d.f: `再~`一~`次~`彈奏~`老的~`曲調~。`比喻~`重新~`提出~`舊~`的~`主張~、`理論~。`如~：「`這次~`的~`企劃~`案~，`只是~`舊調重彈~，`毫無~`新意~。」`也~`作~「`老調重彈~」。

English: replaying the same old tunes (idiom); conservative, unoriginal and discredited
to keep harping on about the same old stuff
francais: (expr. idiom.) jouer toujours la même rengaine
